notes.text:
This update for jdom fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-33813: Fixed possible denial-of-service XXE issue in SAXBuilder via a crafted HTTP request (bsc#1187446).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An XXE issue in SAXBuilder in JDOM through 2.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request.
